FRT_Mask_Presence.display_help: Mask Presence makes you almost impossible to detect. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Like most stealth powers, Mask Presence cannot be used at the same time as other Concealment powers.

FRT_Mind_Link.display_help: Your Mind Link Power will enable you to link the minds of all your teammates who are near you for the next 90 seconds. This shared link improves your team's chance to hit foes, your defensive abilities and dramatically reduces psionic damage. Recharge: Long
FRT_Mind_Link.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, Defense and Psionic Resistance improve due to the Mind Link.
FRT_Mind_Link.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's chance to hit, Defense and Psionic Resistance.
FRT_Mind_Link.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's chance to hit, Defense and Psionic Resistance with their {PowerName}.

Confuse.display_help: You can Confuse an enemy, forcing him to believe his friends are not who they appear to be. If successful, the enemy will ignore you and attack his own allies. If you Confuse someone before he has noticed you, your presence will continue to be masked. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated entirely by a Confused enemy. Recharge: Moderate
Confuse.display_target_help: You have been confused and may attack an incorrect target.
Confuse.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} {PlayerDest} causing them to attack their allies!
Confuse.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} confuses you causing you to attack your own allies!

FRT_Tactical_Training:_Vengeance.display_help: The loss of a comrade enrages the team. When a teammate is defeated in combat, activate this power to grant you and your teammates a bonus to chance to hit, Damage and Defense to all attacks. A Vengeful team has no fear, and Vengeance protects you and your Teammates from Fear effects. It also gives you and your team great resistance to Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Immobilize, Confuse, Taunt, Placate and Knockback. This power does not stack with multiple castings.
FRT_Tactical_Training:_Vengeance.display_target_help: You have been inspired to Vengeance by a natural leader. Your chance to hit, Damage and Defense to melee, ranged, smashing and lethal attacks are all increased and you are resistant to Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Immobilize, Confuse, Taunt, Placate and Knockback.
FRT_Tactical_Training:_Vengeance.display_victim_hit: You fallen teammate has inspired you with {PowerName}.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage.

Aura_of_Confusion.display_help: Aura of Confusion can cause chaos within a group of foes. All affected foes within the area will turn and attack each other, ignoring the user and their allies. If you confuse a foe before they noticed you, your presence will continue to go unnoticed. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated entirely by confused enemies. Recharge: Very Long
Aura_of_Confusion.display_target_help: You are confused and may attack an incorrect target.
Aura_of_Confusion.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} {PlayerDest} causing them to attack their allies!
Aura_of_Confusion.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} confuses you causing you to attack your own allies!

Combat_Training:_Defensive.display_help: You are more evasive to melee attacks.

Tactical_Training:_Maneuvers.display_help: A good leader knows how to protect his team. While active, this power increases the Defense of yourself and all nearby teammates to all attacks.
Tactical_Training:_Maneuvers.display_target_help: Your Defense to all attacks is improved due to good teamwork and leadership.

Indomitable_Will.display_help: When you toggle on this power, it grants protection from Sleep, Disorient, Fear, Immobilize, Confusions, Repel, Knockback and Hold effects. Indomitable Will also grants moderate resistance to Psionic based attacks. Recharge: Fast
Indomitable_Will.display_short_help: Toggle: Self Res (Psionics, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep, Fear, Confuse, Repel, Knockback).
Indomitable_Will.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} protects you from Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient, and Hold effects and improves your resistance to psionic damage.

Tactical_Training:_Assault.display_help: While this power is active, you and your nearby teammates deal more damage and are more resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.display_target_help: Your attack damage is improved due to good leadership and teamwork. You are resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.

Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_help: While this power is active, your chance to hit and that of all your nearby teammates' is increased. Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse and Fear effects, as well as your Perception so you can detect Stealthy foes.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team +To Hit, Res(Confuse, Fear), +Perception
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and Perception is improved due to good teamwork and Leadership.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_attacker_hit: Your Tactical Training increases your team's chance to hit and Perception.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's chance to hit and Perception with their Tactical Training.

Foresight.display_help: Widows who possess Foresight are resistant to Psionic Damage, as well as Sleep, Hold, Immobilization, Disorient, Confuse and Fear effects. Their precognition becomes clearer in times of duress, providing resistance to all damage types based on their current health, as well. They also have improved Defense, due to being able to see attacks slightly before they actually occur.
Foresight.display_short_help: Auto: Self Res (Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Sleep, Fear, Confuse, Psionics, Special), +Def (all)

NW_Mask_Presence.display_help: Mask Presence makes you almost impossible to detect. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Like most stealth powers, Mask Presence cannot be used at the same time as other Concealment powers.

Mental_Training.display_help: Your mental training allows you to focus your will, allowing you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.
Mental_Training.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

NW_Mind_Link.display_help: Your Mind Link Power will enable you to link the minds of all your teammates who are near you for the next 90 seconds. This shared link improves your team's chance to hit foes, your defensive abilities and dramatically reduces psionic damage. Recharge: Long
NW_Mind_Link.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, Defense and Psionic Resistance improve due to the Mind Link.
NW_Mind_Link.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's chance to hit, Defense and Psionic Resistance.
NW_Mind_Link.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's chance to hit, Defense and Psionic Resistance with their {PowerName}.

Placate.display_help: Allow you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A Successful Placate will also grant you stealth. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, he will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Long

messages.display_victim_hit: You have been Placated and cannot target {PlayerSource}.

NW_Tactical_Training:_Vengeance.display_help: The loss of a comrade enrages the team. When a teammate is defeated in combat, activate this power to grant you and your teammates a bonus to chance to hit, Damage and Defense to all attacks. A Vengeful team has no fear, and Vengeance protects you and your Teammates from Fear effects. It also gives you and your team great resistance to Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Immobilize, Confuse, Taunt, Placate and Knockback. This power does not stack with multiple castings.
NW_Tactical_Training:_Vengeance.display_target_help: You have been inspired to Vengeance by a natural leader. Your chance to hit, Damage and Defense to melee, ranged, smashing and lethal attacks are all increased and you are resistant to Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Immobilize, Confuse, Taunt, Placate and Knockback.
NW_Tactical_Training:_Vengeance.display_victim_hit: You fallen teammate has inspired you with {PowerName}.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage.

Elude.display_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height and Endurance Recovery are also increased. Elude also grants you high resistance to Defense DeBuffs. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
Elude.display_attacker_hit: You are now extremely Elusive, and almost impossible to hit.

messages.display_attacker_hit: {PowerName} has left you exhausted and unable to Recovery Endurance for a while!
